full_text:
“If you admire somebody, you should go ahead and tell them.
People never get the flowers while they can still smell them.” https://t.co/RLIjTjxJuI
One of my favorite retail stories involves the holiday season, an iPod, and a team meeting at Target (it’s been 10+ years, should this should be safe to share, eh?) ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ 🧵 1/5
